record.jsxtext: Before Move
record.jsxtip: Fires when the user depresses the mouse button on the caption bar of this dialog. Canceling this event prevents this dialog from moving.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
set to true if only vertical movement allowed. For example: o = {bCONSTRAINX:true};
set to true if only horizontal movement allowed. For example: o = {bCONSTRAINY:true};
After Move
record.jsxtip: Fires when the user releases the mouse button after moving this dialog across the screen.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the new left offet.
the new top offet.
Before Resize
record.jsxtip: Fires when the user depresses the mouse button on the lower-right corner of this dialog. Canceling this event prevents this window from resizing.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
After Resize
record.jsxtip: Fires when the user releases the mouse button after resizing this dialog by dragging its lower-right corner.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the new width.
the new height.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this dialog is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this dialog before it is removed from the DOM.
